BEFORE_METHOD_STARTING - Enum constant in enum class ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.testng.integration.properties.RefreshEachTimeBefore

METHOD_STARTING - Enum constant in enum class ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.testng.integration.properties.RefreshEachTimeBefore
